subject: Football (College)
Hoaxes
lead_paragraph: Dr. Phil McGraw said Ronaiah Tuiasosopo, who masterminded the dead girlfriend hoax involving Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o, told him Te’o was not involved in the scheme.
snippet: Dr. Phil McGraw said Ronaiah Tuiasosopo, who masterminded the dead girlfriend hoax involving Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te’o, told him Te’o was not involved in the scheme.
